data.name: The Alchemist Demo
data.detailed_description:
The Alchemist is a game about a young man who is trying to follow in his late fathers footsteps to become a master Alchemist. So he left his home with only a map, his inheritance and some stories to guide him on his journey. Wilder Village was his destination, often told of as an idyllic village that borders the dangerous and awe inspiring 'Great Wilderness'. After months of travel the protagonist has finally arrived...

Wilder Village & The Great Wilderness


The village houses a selection of locations you can visit and people you can meet and work with whilst exploring the wilderness that borders the village. You can also build relationships with them, help them out with a few things and even have a romance, or maybe just have some casual dates if you prefer.

Just outside the village is the entryway to the Wilderness an area considered wild and mostly unexplored, filled with creatures of legend, beasts and most importantly reagents. The items you find will allow you to craft new potions to sell in your shop and increase your wealth and experience to become a new master Alchemist.

Features

  • Manage a Potions and Curio's shop
  • Explore the Great Wilderness
  • Encounter random events and people
  • Battle Creatures, Monsters and Bandits
  • Gather ingredients and craft potions and items
  • Test unknown potions with your apprentice
  • Improve your fighting skills via a leveling system
  • Increase your Alchemy knowledge
  • Get to know your fellow villagers
  • Upgrade your armor and weapons
  • Build relationships with different people
  • Travel to the city for specialist training
  • Relax and spend time fishing
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Become an Alchemist; explore the Great Wilderness, fight monsters, find ingredients, craft potions & items to sell in your shop, gain power to become a Master Alchemist in the fantasy world of Ethermearial.

pc_requirements.minimum:
ขั้นต่ำ:
  • ระบบปฏิบัติการ: Windows XP
  • หน่วยประมวลผล: 1.66 Ghz
  • หน่วยความจำ: แรม 2 GB
  • กราฟิก: 1920x1080
  • หน่วยบันทึกข้อมูล: พื้นที่ว่างที่พร้อมใช้งาน 2 GB
  • การ์ดเสียง: DirectX Compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
ขั้นต่ำ:
  • ระบบปฏิบัติการ: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 or later
  • หน่วยประมวลผล: 1.66 Ghz
  • หน่วยความจำ: แรม 2 GB
  • กราฟิก: 1920x1080
  • หน่วยบันทึกข้อมูล: พื้นที่ว่างที่พร้อมใช้งาน 2 GB

linux_requirements.minimum:
ขั้นต่ำ:
  • ระบบปฏิบัติการ: Ubuntu 12.04
  • หน่วยประมวลผล: 1.66 Ghz
  • หน่วยความจำ: แรม 2 GB
  • กราฟิก: 1920x1080
  • หน่วยบันทึกข้อมูล: พื้นที่ว่างที่พร้อมใช้งาน 2 GB
